Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to providing for the remote conduct of certain practices and procedures
Summary: Provides for the remote conduct of certain practices and procedures utilizing electronic and/or audio-visual technologies.
LawCode: Amd §11, Bank L; amd §171, Tax L; add §137-a, Exec L; amd §§3-2.1 & 7-1.17, EPT L; amd §§2981 & 4201, Pub Health L; add §304-a, RP L; amd §5-1514, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, the tax law, the executive law, the estates, powers and trusts law, the public health law, the real property law and the general obligations law, in relation to providing for the remote conduct of certain practices and procedures
